name: Jay Politzer
other: Top 3 Finalist, NTC Awards Emerging Company of the Year
profile: I am a technologist with a passion for building companies and bringing products to life. As Co-Founder, Chief Technology Officer, and Chief Administrative Officer of Satchel Health, I have first-hand and in-depth experience in nearly every stage of the startup lifecycle, from designing, iterating, and developing multiple product lines to establishing, executing, and maintaining operational necessities and objectives.

experience.title: Partner
highlights: Develop iOS apps in React Native and Redux that harness offline async storage, push notifications, mobile navigation, camera interaction, and image manipulation
Deliver React-based web app MVPs served by Express and Hapi frameworks and consuming data from MongoDB, MySQL, and Postgres databases
Launch server-less backend services utilizing cloud-based functions and APIs, realtime databases, and authentication
Wrote data parser to ingest disparate data sources from Excel spreadsheets, normalize data fields and values, and convert into manageable JSON structures
Architected cloud-based media upload and playback framework for streaming music services, including audio/video encoding, CDN configuration, and bucket storage strategies
Designed dynamic web-based contract generation and signing workflow
Built marketing automation microservice that enables campaign creation and tracking, transactional and bulk email distribution, and contact management

Help clients transform business ideas into actionable product development strategies by conducting product research and market validation, roadmapping feature sets for multiple platforms and verticals, and providing industry-leading recommendations for platform infrastructure and deployment
Advise clients on establishing software development lifecycles and drafting job descriptions to recruit software engineering first hires

experience.title: Co-Founder & CTO
highlights: Led technical processes, peer code reviews, and testing/deployment schedules
Managed a team of 6 software engineers and designers using Kanban methodology
Spearheaded the migration of application from Angular 1 to React and Redux
Utilized WebRTC API to enable realtime multi-peer audio/video communication user interface in React and deployed custom signaling server and STUN/TURN/ SFU infrastructure to AWS
Programmed front-end decision tree logic and swipeable components in React for helping clinicians determine medical conditions and chief complaints
Created dynamic medical documentation module in React to allow for templating, e-signing, and amending SOAP notes
Developed realtime streaming microservice for medical diagnostic devices, including stethoscope, pulse oximeter, and dermatascope
Wrote video streaming application for wearable eyewear devices such as Google Glass and Vuzix M100
Architected and wrote dispatching system for connecting credentialed and licensed medical specialists with nurses and patients on-demand
Deployed web application in kiosk mode onto Android tablets and Microsoft PCs using a tailored Chromium Embedded Framework
Designed and implemented event-sourcing microservice architecture to provide immutable data structure and allow for easy auditing of application state
Created webhooks for 3rd party event-driven interaction with company API
Collaborated with designers to design and validate UX and UI designs
Drafted HIPAA policies, ensured end-to-end data encryption in transit and at rest, and engaged with 3rd parties to undertake routine security audits, penetration testing, and risk assessments
Distilled strategic vision into actionable technical requirements and worked with VP of Engineering to develop product roadmap and accompanying resource needs
Worked with leadership team to meet potential clients, close deals, and provide technical feedback/assistance during customer implementations

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Full-stack Ruby on Rails and Javascript engineer
Maintained legacy Rails application that experienced over 1,000,000 unique visitors each month
Technical lead for converting Rails application to mobile-first layouts on a rolling basis
Launched marketing microsites that included gamification and enhanced user engagement tracking tools
Developed cascading grid layout for dynamic fitting and resizing of DOM elements
